action.text:
declare @c varchar(33), @ngay_ct smalldatetime, @d smalldatetime, @ty_gia numeric(24, 12) select @ngay_ct = dbo.ff_GetEndDateOfCycle(@ky, @nam), @c = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' if exists(select 1 from dmnt where ma_nt = @ma_nt and ma_nt <> @c) begin if exists(select * from dmtgnt where ngay_ct <= @ngay_ct and ma_nt = rtrim(@ma_nt)) begin select @d = max(ngay_ct) from dmtgnt where ngay_ct <= @ngay_ct and ma_nt = rtrim(@ma_nt) select @ty_gia = ty_gia from dmtgnt where ngay_ct = @d and ma_nt = rtrim(@ma_nt) end else select @ty_gia = 0
select @ty_gia as value return end

declare @$lockedDate nvarchar(512) select @$lockedDate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày giới hạn hoặc ngày khóa sổ.' else N'Data is locked, you must modify system locked date.' end if exists(select 1 from dmstt where ngay_ks >= dateadd(m, 1, cast(str(@nam, 4) + replace(str(@ky, 2), ' ', '0') + '01' as smalldatetime)) - 1) begin select 'ky' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end if @ds_dvcs <> '' begin if exists(select 1 from dmdvcsks where charindex(',' + rtrim(ma_dvcs) + ',', ',' + replace(@ds_dvcs, ' ', '') + ',') > 0 and ngay_ks >= dateadd(m, 1, cast(str(@nam, 4) + replace(str(@ky, 2), ' ', '0') + '01' as smalldatetime)) - 1) begin select 'ky' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end end else begin if exists(select 1 from dmdvcsks where ma_dvcs in (select ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID) and ngay_ks >= dateadd(m, 1, cast(str(@nam, 4) + replace(str(@ky, 2), ' ', '0') + '01' as smalldatetime)) - 1) begin select 'ky' as field, @$lockedDate as message return end end
if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, '&Controller;', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end
select top 0 * into #t from dmtgdg select @ds_dvcs = replace(replace(@ds_dvcs, ' ', ''), '''', '''''') select * into #dv from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_dvcs, ',') select @ds_tk = replace(replace(@ds_tk, ' ', ''), '''', '''''') select * into #tk from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@ds_tk, ',') insert into #t select @ky, @nam, a.data, b.data, @ma_nt, @ty_gia, '', getdate(), getdate(), @@userID, @@userID from #dv a, #tk b &Account.ExchangeRate;
if @type = '0' delete #t from #t a join dmtgdg b on a.ky = b.ky and a.nam = b.nam and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk
select a.* into #k from #t a join dmtgdg b on a.ky = b.ky and a.nam = b.nam and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk delete #t where rtrim(ky) + rtrim(nam) + rtrim(ma_dvcs) + rtrim(tk) in (select rtrim(ky) + rtrim(nam) + rtrim(ma_dvcs) + rtrim(tk) from #k)
if @@admin = 0 begin if @type = '1' begin if exists (select 1 from #k a join dmtgdg b on a.ky = b.ky and a.nam = b.nam and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk where not exists(select 1 from sysunitrights c where b.ma_dvcs = c.ma_dvcs and r_edit = 1 and c.user_id = @@userID)) begin select '' as array$, 1 as value return end end end
insert into dmtgdg (ky, nam, ma_dvcs, tk, ma_nt, ty_gia, ghi_chu, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select ky, nam, ma_dvcs, tk, ma_nt, ty_gia, ghi_chu, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2 from #t
if @type = '1' begin update dmtgdg set ma_nt = b.ma_nt, ty_gia = b.ty_gia from dmtgdg a join #k b on a.ky = b.ky and a.nam = b.nam and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs end
select '' as array$, 0 as value return
